name: AQUA (itch) (Liza Shelkovich)
description:
Are you ready to try on a martian suit and fight for the planet’s last drop of water?  

Think fast 'cause this action real-time race will keep your heart pounding from start to finish! 

And  you  will  beg  for  more  !

Aqua is an outta-this-world multiplayer strategy game where you and your three buddies compete on Mars in a thrilling water hunt. Gather as much H2O as possible and be the last one standing.

It'll take quick thinking, fast reflexes and some serious strategy skills to survive this wild ride.

Let's get wet!

Developed by: Elior Digmi , Tal Brauner

Designed by: Ofek Applebaum , Liza Shelkovich
